data.title: Durham International Airport
data.meta_description: Nonstop Destinations The map below indicates maintained air service to actively-served nonstop destinations from RDU. The following list includes all current and scheduled service, along with the airlines serving those destinations. Seasonal and daily frequency could vary. See airline websites below for details.
data.text:
Nonstop Destinations

The map below indicates maintained air service to actively-served nonstop destinations from RDU. The following list includes all current and scheduled service, along with the airlines serving those destinations.

Seasonal and daily frequency could vary. See airline websites below for details.
